roleset.name: help

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: The Fed chairman 's caution was apparent again on the Monday morning after the market 's plunge , when the central bank took only modest steps to aid the markets .

example.name: with Arg1 and Arg2
example.text: Though Spain has an excess of banks , analysts say the country still has one of the most profitable markets in Europe , which will aid Banco Exterior with the tough tasks it faces ahead .

propbank.arg: one of the most profitable markets in Europe
with the tough tasks it faces ahead

example.name: with a prepositional Arg1
example.text: The House , meanwhile , approved $ 2.85 billion to aid in the recovery from the temblor and from Hurricane Hugo as state legislators moved toward a temporary sales - tax increase .

propbank.arg: in the recovery from the temblor and from Hurricane Hugo

example.name: passive
example.text: Salomon posted an unexpectedly big gain in quarterly earnings , aided by its securities trading and investment banking activities .

propbank.arg: an unexpectedly big gain in quarterly earnings
by its securities trading and investment banking activities

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: An increase in production at some major oil fields in the North Sea , which had been knocked out by an explosion in July 1988 , also aided results .

propbank.arg: An increase in production at some major oil fields in the North Sea , which had been knocked out by an explosion in July 1988

example.name: NP only, arg 1
example.text: greater economic aid and technological know - how to flow from Westto East

example.name: Arg 0 as "of" PP
example.text: Our garden desperately needs the aid of a knowledgeable horticulturist .

example.name: ARG1
example.text: For Angola , the United Nations is appealing for $ 202 million in food aid .

example.name: Args 0 and 2
example.text: Foreign aid to that region increased by twenty million dollars this year .

example.name: Arg 2 and MNR
example.text: The U.N. is threatening to cut off financial aid to that nation but not medical aid .

roleset.note: AID-V NOTES: frames created by Olga. Member of Vncls help-72-1. (from aid.01-v)
AID-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry aid.01, OntoNotes grouping aid-n senses 1,2, & 3; maps to VN class help-72-1. Framed by Claire. (from aid.01-n)
